fields.name: Second Section Hero Secondary Action Label
Second Section Hero Secondary Action URL

settings.helpText: If you do not include a component, it will not be displayed on the page. Options are "Text Header", "Section Hero" "Room Cards", "Premium Hero", and "Promotions".
Filling in "Sidebar Section" fields will override the "Type: Suite" object that shows up by default in the overview sidebar.
The two column hero can be used to up-sell packages a customer can purchase, such as a VIP package/
This is an unpublished field. This box is here simply to leave notes about the page that may be useful later.
Sample taglines include "The Suite Life", "Endless Luxury", etc.
This is the image that appears when showing the picture of a room on another room page, or a room landing page.
All general pictures of the room should go here, with the exception of the Room Teaser Image.
Does the room include lounge access? If so, link the correct lounge here.
These amenities show up as a bulleted list on room detail pages.
For example,  a "Technology" amenity could have enumerable items such as "Flat screen TV", "Wi-fi Access", etc.
If looking at this room on the booking site, what other rooms might a visitor also want to consider?

textHeaderSubtitle.en-US: ARIA Las Vegas boasts some of the best in hotel rooms and suites on the Las Vegas Strip. Learn more about the types of rooms you can book at ARIA today.

firstSectionHeroDescription.en-US: ARIA’s Deluxe Rooms include a world of unexpected amenities. With an in-room tablet for environment control, these rooms are pure perfection.

secondSectionHeroDescription.en-US: Indulge your desires at ARIA Sky Suites, a luxurious AAA Five Diamond retreat high above the Las Vegas Strip.

content.value: Elevate your Tower Suites

stay by adding the Tower Suites VIP Arrival Experience to your reservation. Add-on includes the following amenities: - Roundtrip Luxury Airport Transfer - Welcome Cocktail at Lobby Bar for Two - In-suite Welcome Amenity - In-suite American Breakfast for Two (2) Purchase this package for a one-time fee of $250 when you add-on to any Tower Suites booking on [Aria.com](https://www.aria.com)

* Prices subject to change during holidays and peak periods. Additional taxes may apply. Please contact Tower Suites Concierge for more information. Terms and conditions apply.
If you would like to add this package on any existing Tower Suites reservation please contact Tower Suites.

description.en-US: Tower Suites takes your Vegas stay to the next level. Enjoy special privileges such as enhanced turndown or priority line access for taxi service.
From greeting you upon your arrival or surprising a loved one,  your personalized Concierge staff experts can make anything happen.
Check-in from the Tower Suites Lounge. Enjoy private access and complimentary drinks from a state-of-the-art LAMILL Coffee Machine.

title.en-US: Double the points, double the fun

description.en-US: Earn double World of Hyatt Points on all eligible spend through December 29.
Save more when you book your flight and hotel together!
Countless indulgences are at your fingertips via our revolutionary new in-room tablet.
Book by November 15 to enjoy these special rates plus bonus discounts.

title.en-US: Warm up with 30% off your winter escape

description.en-US: Book by November 15 and stay by September 30, 2019 to enjoy these special rates.

shortDescription.en-US: These AAA Three Diamond-rated rooms are just steps away from Hakkasan Nightclub and Las Vegas Boulevard.

longDescription.en-US: Located in the West Tower, the 350-sqft West Wing King rooms offer a king size bed, complimented by sleek, modern design in a comfortable space. These rooms also provide convenient access to the Las Vegas Strip as well as Hakkasan Restaurant & Nightclub.

overviewDescription.en-US: Step into our AAA Three Diamond-rated West Wing King room and kick back. The West Wing is just steps from Hakkasan & Las Vegas Boulevard. These 350-square-foot rooms offer a king size bed, complimented by sleek design in a comfortable space.

shortDescription.en-US: Our 1-Bedroom Penthouse Suite wraps you in a luxuriousness you'll be reluctant to leave.

content.value: Pamper yourself with 920 square feet dedicated to you. Decisions, decisions. Loving the view from the living room? Then the view from the bedroom will also make your jaw drop. Our 920-square-foot Corner Suites have awe-inspiring views of the mountains throughout your suite. And every detail—from the three LCD HD televisions to the custom-made beds—was designed to spoil you.

title.en-US: One Bedroom ARIA Suite with Two Queen Beds

shortDescription.en-US: Breathe in - the air really is better up here. Approximately 1,050 square feet of sheer opulence.

content.value: Pamper yourself with 920 square feet dedicated to you. Decisions, decisions. Loving the view from the living room? Then the view from the bedroom will also make your jaw drop. Our 920-square-foot Corner Suites have awe-inspiring views of the mountains throughout your suite. And every detail—from the three LCD HD televisions to the custom-made beds—was designed to spoil you.

dedicated to you. Decisions, decisions. Loving the view from the living room? Then the view from the bedroom will also make your jaw drop. Our 920-square-foot Corner Suites have awe-inspiring views of the mountains throughout your suite. shortDescription.en-US: Panoramic views of The Strip and spacious living and bedroom areas.",

content.value: If panoramic views of The Strip and spacious living and bedroom areas are your style, then this is your suite. Tucked centrally between ARIA’s two towers, enjoy 1,075 square feet of separate living and bedroom spaces, a custom-made Sealy® bed and 300-thread-count, triple-sheeted bedding. We’ve made restful sleep even easier with a goodnight button to power down your room with the touch of a fingertip.

shortDescription.en-US: Soak your cares away in an open-air whirlpool tub.

content.value: Pamper yourself
with
920 square feet

dedicated to you. Decisions, decisions. Loving the view from the living room? Then the view from the bedroom will also make your jaw drop. Our 920-square-foot Corner Suites have awe-inspiring views of the mountains throughout your suite. And every detail—from the three LCD HD televisions to the custom-made beds—was designed to spoil you.

shortDescription.en-US: Deluxe Rooms at ARIA average 520 sq ft with unparalleled amenities, corner views and state of the art.

content.value: Go to sleep with just one touch. Triple-sheeted, 300-thread-count bedding. A goodnight button to power down your room with the touch of your finger. Custom beds from Sealy®. These are just a few of the details we’ve perfected in our 520-square-foot sanctuaries. And it’s earned us top ratings from both AAA and Forbes Travel Guide. Our Deluxe Rooms have all the amenities to make for a glamorous Las Vegas stay.

shortDescription.en-US: We've thought of everything, so you can forget it all. This Penthouse is the ultimate in contemporary sophistication.

content.value: Pamper yourself with 920 square feet dedicated to you. Decisions, decisions. Loving the view from the living room? Then the view from the bedroom will also make your jaw drop. Our 920-square-foot Corner Suites have awe-inspiring views of the mountains throughout your suite. And every detail—from the three LCD HD televisions to the custom-made beds—was designed to spoil you.

shortDescription.en-US: he quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

content.value: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

shortDescription.en-US: You shouldn't have to settle for anything but the best. And with our 2-Bedroom ARIA Suite, you won't.

content.value: Pamper yourself with 920 square feet dedicated to you. Decisions, decisions. Loving the view from the living room? Then the view from the bedroom will also make your jaw drop. Our 920-square-foot Corner Suites have awe-inspiring views of the mountains throughout your suite. And every detail—from the three LCD HD televisions to the custom-made beds—was designed to spoil you.

title.en-US: The Concierge will help bring your ideas to life and ensure that every detail of your vision is executed flawlessly.
Whether it's celebrating a special occasion or just to put a surprised smile on her face, trust the Concierge at ARIA with all your floral needs.
Whether it's celebrating a special occasion or just to put a surprised smile on her face, trust the Concierge at ARIA with all your floral needs.

10" Tablet to Control Light, Temperature, Request Butler Service and Much More
42" HD LCD Television with Full Device Connectivity
Connectivity Panel for Laptops, DVD Players, Gaming Consoles or MP3 Players
Preferred Tee Times to Shadow Creek Golf Course

Elevate your Tower Suites stay by adding the Tower Suites VIP Arrival Experience to your reservation. Add-on includes the following amenities: - Roundtrip Luxury Airport Transfer - Welcome Cocktail at Lobby Bar for Two - In-suite Welcome Amenity - In-suite American Breakfast for Two (2) Purchase this package for a one-time fee of $250 when you add-on to any Tower Suites booking on [Aria.com](https://www.aria.com)

* Prices subject to change during holidays and peak periods. Additional taxes may apply. Please contact Tower Suites Concierge for more information. Terms and conditions apply.
If you would like to add this package on any existing Tower Suites reservation please contact Tower Suites.

roles.name: Editor
roles.description: Allows editing, publishing and archiving of content

roles.name: Freelancer
roles.description: Allows only editing of content they created themselves

roles.name: Translator
roles.description: Allows editing of localized fields in the specified language
